meta_description: Home to Milwaukee's pioneer brewing family and five archbishops, this mansion at 2000 W. Wisconsin Avenue is being restored to its original splendor.
hours_text:
## **PABST MANSION**

###### A historic house museum and architectural landmark in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

### [Buy Tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114034517/https://book.peek.com/s/dc4b3489-5ae1-4299-965d-676407d25cea/y0aKk)

### _Check in for admission at the new Visitor Center & Gift Shop, located in The Marq building next door to the west of the Pabst Mansion._

**While onsite admissions will be available, we recommend that you reserve your slot in advance.**  
Tickets can be purchased online here: [Online Ticket Reservations](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114034517/https://book.peek.com/s/dc4b3489-5ae1-4299-965d-676407d25cea/y0aKk)

## **[VISIT](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114034517/https://www.pabstmansion.com/visit/hours-admission/)**

###### See the splendor of Pabst Mansion on a tour!

## **[SHOP](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114034517/https://pabst-mansion.square.site/)**

###### Check out our PBR and Pabst Mansion goods!

## **[CONTRIBUTE](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114034517/https://www.pabstmansion.com/contribute/donate-1/)**

###### Contribute to the Pabst Mansion.

#### Mission Statement:

###### Pabst Mansion, Inc. preserves, shares, and interprets an iconic Milwaukee home that serves as a testament to the Gilded Age. Through immersive tours, educational opportunities, and programming, Pabst Mansion, Inc. brings visitors back in time to help understand the present, sharing the story of brewing, architecture, art, and culture through the l...
admission_text:
# Hours & Admission

While onsite admissions will be available, we recommend that you reserve your slot in advance.  
Tickets can be purchased online here: [Online Ticket Reservations](http://web.archive.org/web/20251008061914/https://book.peek.com/s/dc4b3489-5ae1-4299-965d-676407d25cea/y0aKk)

#### Tours are offered on the hour. Please arrive at least 10 minutes before your tour.

#### _Please check in for admission at the new Visitor Center & Gift Shop, located in The Marq building next door to the west of the Pabst Mansion._

[Classic Guided Tours](http://web.archive.org/web/20251008061914/https://www.peek.com/s/dc4b3489-5ae1-4299-965d-676407d25cea/pxzy6)
